oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Danish Organic Pork Chain
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kledal, Paul Rye
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: History of organics
Produce chain management
Farm economics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The development of the Danish organic pork Chain in relation to production structure, volume, value of production and flow through the chain from 'farm to fork', as well as focusing on the power relations along the chain
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kledal, Paul Rye (2007) The Danish Organic Pork Chain. Institute of Food and Resource Economis, Copenhagen University.
